title: Bontexkenzy
author: Bontexkenzy
content: Sports all over the world has played and will continue to play importance role in peace making and building.Using Russian and Ukraine war as an example, the agitation and support of different sports organs eg football, tennis, basketball and the rest is playing important role in resolving the war.some sports even went ahead as suspending and disqualifying the parties involved.  In conclusion, sports is another way of life.aside the entertainment, the health benefits,it also helps in resolving conflict

comments.author: PrimeNumber7
comments.body: Sports does help bring communities together and two teams from countries at war with each other competing with each other is something that I can see would reduce public support for said war. However there is already little public support in Russia for the war and Russia is not a democracy, so Putin cannot get voted out. Do you have any specific examples of when sports were used, in part to end wars? Most modern wars that I can think of have been won by one side with their military

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Bontexkenzy on June 28, 2022, 06:48:31 PMSports all over the world has played and will continue to play importance role in peace making and building.Sport games has helped in many ways towards the global integration of people to symphony, we have it as a general and acceptable event that does not have any geographical barriers, it brings about tourism, expositions, development, friendliness and international ties among countries, it also serve as an opportunity to travel abroad, enjoy the pleasure in sport games with a fun-filled experience during leisure.To an extent it is used as a peace keeping techniques among people with communal clashes, in the case of Russia and Ukraine, many suggested the boycott of Russia from sport but that goes against the ethics in sports, we can't denied the people acces to sport, sanction itself is well good enough but shouldn't extend to the sport advantage on Russia, we all go against the war on Ukraine because it keeps claiming lives which is unethical.

comments.author: Moneyprism
comments.body: i remember that several years ago at the Asian Games, South and North Korea used the same flag for peace... that is one example of how sport can unite two warring parties and reduce political tensions between the two countries.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: "Sports" usually includes physical exercise and precision. And world sports actually does bring nations together. So, we have this big sports thing going on between Russia and Ukraine. And it might wind up involving a whole lot of other nations sometime soon.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Sports has done so much in the effort to promoting peace in the society today.Sport has made countries that had problems,issues, with each other come together.Sport is very important today in the society because it is through sports that many countries have foreigners leaving in their country.The passion that comes with sport can not be measured to any other thing.The rate of excitement one has while watching any of the sporting activities is capable of healing a sick person.That is why physical and health education is studied in secondary schools today.It doesn't only benefit the body,but it also brings unity,peace and love among the people leaving in a society.

comments.author: Morningstarr
comments.body: Sports play an excellent role in establishing peace in society. I give the example of Pakistan. After 9/11, the American and Afghan war was also fought on Pakistani soil. Terrorism increased. People became insecure but even when the war stopped, The locals were reluctant to go out without any special need and in these circumstances, Foreigners did not come So the government started resettling the sports fields. In the beginning, there were some difficulties but now the situation is much better. With the settlement of cricket and other sports grounds, people became stronger both mentally and physically. Investment also started coming in from outside and people started engaging in various activities which increased the activities in society.An idle brain is the devil's workshop.that's why sports are very useful in making society better.Pakistan and India are enemies of each other but when there is a cricket match during the World Cup our hearts beat together love grows so Russian and Ukrainian can also come close to each other but the condition is that first the war should be stopped from both sides

comments.author: proTECH77
comments.body: Sport has done so many positive things in some countries which the citizens are enjoying today in different countries of the world. Sport bring peace to some countries through football competition which many citizens has learned a lot that is making them to be at peace with their international club.   Many countries that are into sport activities are really doing well in the areas of economy, because they used the profits they made from sport competition to grow their economy for their citizens to enjoy in the societies.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: Bontexkenzy on June 28, 2022, 06:48:31 PMSports all over the world has played and will continue to play importance role in peace making and building.Using Russian and Ukraine war as an example, the agitation and support of different sports organs eg football, tennis, basketball and the rest is playing important role in resolving the war.some sports even went ahead as suspending and disqualifying the parties involved.  In conclusion, sports is another way of life.aside the entertainment, the health benefits,it also helps in resolving conflict You have a valid point when you asserted that sports could bring people together, but in the case of the Russia-Ukraine war, I doubt football can bring about a resolution when negotiations can't.  Health practitioners advise that one engage in physical exercises to help fluid movements and ensure a longer lifespan. In the area of suspending Russia from participating in football and other activities, I see it as a means to discourage the war, but it looks like Putin has found a way to lighten the pressure oligarchs who have shares and own football clubs are mounting on him.

comments.author: Gosgosking
comments.body: Sports has always been an activity that is full of much peace, in our surroundings most times when we go out for sport, Sports brings more friendship with strong love. I haven't seen when sport disunite people,  but it always bring reason for people to love one another.  Sport is more than a game but contains real love.
